name: My Vaporwave Pet
description:
A small virtual pet, modeled from the toys of the late 90's.

--------
Controls
Left / Right to make a selection (up top)
'Z' to select it

You can feed your pet pizza/carrots
Praise/Punish them
Clean up their poop

Experiment and see what monsters you can get! There are several forms! :D

---------------

Please enjoy the tunes!

Music used with permission from Roex ::

Track 1 - ラミエル (Ramiel)

Track 2 - 人類補完計画 (Human Instrumentality Project)

Track 3 - 東方の三博士 (Magi)
